main event: A UFO report from Project Blue Book documented a ground-visual observation of a round, brilliant light in Macnilto, Okinawa on 25 September 1954.
interesting points: The observation involved a single object that drifted slowly with no sound.
Although initially labeled as a balloon, the officer noted that a weather balloon had been launched in the same area as the sighting.
The report includes photographs of the observed object.
The conclusion was inconclusive, with the possibility of it being a balloon.
This event took place in Okinawa during 1954, adding to the history of UFO sightings in the area.
